content: I think I've figured it out: I was overly hasty in creating and restoring to the new "Local Folders" directory such that I did it before Thunderbird had created it. So Thunderbird seems to have seen the directory already existed and instead created "Local Folders-1" which it used for that purpose, which is why changes to "Local Folders" weren't being reflected.
creator: avocat3

content: If not appearing on Thunderbird, it may be that there is an error in the setup. Check the Fastmail settings for email accounts and then post any error messages here. Here are settings I found on the fastmail website; https://www.mailjerry.com/fastmail-imap-settings/

content: Both accounts need to be IMAP for this to happen.
creator: davidsk

content: First, do not attempt to change the POP account to IMAP. Instead, create the IMAP account along side of the POP account, Now, since iMAP wasn't designed for high volume uploads, I suggest creating a filter to run manually to COPY the messages from the POP account to the IMAP account. Once you have done that, you can delete the POP account.
creator: davidsk

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content: Welk wachtwoord bedoelt u? Het wachtwoord voor uw Mozilla-account, uw hoofdwachtwoord, uw e-mailwachtwoord? Of wellicht uw wachtwoord om u bij uw Microsoft-account aan te melden als u een Windows-pc hebt?

content: click settings>composition and there is a box to tick/untick for saving outgoing email addresses. These are saved in the collected addressbook, so it's easy to locate and delete them.
creator: davidsk

content:
U dient hiervoor uw berichtopmaak op ‘HTML’ in te stellen. U kunt dan bijvoorbeeld een kleine afbeelding invoegen via Invoegen > Afbeelding > Bestand kiezen > [navigeren naar bestand] > Openen > Deze afbeelding aan het bericht koppelen selecteren, en daar een URL aan koppelen via het tabblad Koppeling tijdens het invoegen. Tijdens het invoegen kunt u ook eventueel de afmetingen instellen.

Let wel op, als u een afbeelding gebruikt, dan moet die zijn opgeslagen op uw computer om correct meegestuurd te worden.
creator: markh2

content: Non ci sono modifica particolari in tema di Firma in Thunderbird 137. Però senza conoscere i dettagli di come è fatta la firma e di cosa non funziona è difficile fare ipotesi.
